players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is."
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and gather more information. I won't reveal the mafioso's identity just yet."
You: "I'm the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Don't trust Charlie, he might be lying about being the detective."
Bob: "I'm not the mafioso. I was with Alice last night and we didn't kill Diana. Charlie, you said you're the detective. Can you prove it?"
